Seal Guardian Gabriel:
Land Dragon Antharas live in his Lair. You must collect *four Mark of Watchman* from next persons:
*Visit them in the certain order:* First, visit *Magister Kaiena* at the *Ivory Tower*. Next visit *High Priest Orven* at the *Tower of Aden*. Third, you must visit *Master Kendra*, she is staing in the *Tower of Aden* too. Fourth, go to the *Prefect Chakiris* at the *Hunters Village*.
